Package kieker.monitoring.writer.serializer

Interface IMonitoringRecordSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContainerFormatSerializer, AbstractMonitoringRecordSerializer, BinarySerializer, StringSerializer
public interface IMonitoringRecordSerializer
Interface for monitoring record serializers.
Since:
1.13
Author:
Holger Knoche

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onInitialization()
    Called by the collector during initialization (before any records are written).
    void onTermination()
    Called by the collector upon termination (after remaining records have been flushed).
    int serializeRecord​(IMonitoringRecord record, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
    Serializes a single record into the given byte buffer.
    int serializeRecords​(java.util.Collection<IMonitoringRecord> records, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
    Serializes multiple monitoring records into the given byte buffer.

  • Method Details

    • serializeRecord

      int serializeRecord​(IMonitoringRecord record, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Serializes a single record into the given byte buffer.
      Parameters:
      record - The record to serialize
      buffer - The buffer to write to
      Returns:
      The number of bytes written to the buffer
      Since:
      1.13

    • serializeRecords

      int serializeRecords​(java.util.Collection<IMonitoringRecord> records, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Serializes multiple monitoring records into the given byte buffer.
      Parameters:
      records - The records to serialize
      buffer - The buffer to write to
      Returns:
      The number of bytes written to the buffer
      Since:
      1.13

    • onInitialization

      void onInitialization()
      Called by the collector during initialization (before any records are written).
      Since:
      1.13

    • onTermination

      void onTermination()
      Called by the collector upon termination (after remaining records have been flushed).
      Since:
      1.13
